delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risky user information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risky user information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to deliver its notifications on behalf of signed-in users. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete the user's notification items for this app.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to deliver its notifications, on your behalf. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete your notification items for this app.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read programs and program controls that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete apps in the app catalogs.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Export user's data
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read your organization's security events
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's security events on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's security events on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security events
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's security events on your behalf. Also allows you to update editable properties in security events.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a scored list of relevant people of the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to you. Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to another user in your organization. These can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all users? relevant people lists

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on behalf of the user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage education app settings
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read education app settings
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view and modify your assignments on your behalf including ?grades.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades on behalf of the user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view your assignments on your behalf including grades.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view and modify your assignments on your behalf without seeing grades.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read assignments without grades on behalf of the user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read users' class assignments without grades
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view your assignments on your behalf without seeing grades.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read and written on behalf of the user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write users' view of the roster

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read on behalf of the user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view information about schools and classes in your organization and education-related information about you and other users on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a limited subset of the properties from the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and a limited subset of properties about users to be read on behalf of the user.?Includes name, status, education role, email address and photo.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read a limited subset of users' view of the roster
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view minimal ?information about both schools and classes in your organization and education-related information about you and other users on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to report your app activity information to Microsoft Timeline.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete your mailbox settings.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to launch another app or communicate with another app on a device that you own.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks that you have access to.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read OneNote notebooks on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to view the titles of your OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your mailbox settings.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: (Preview) Allows the app to read and write files that you select. After you select a file, the app has access to the file for several hours.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: (Preview) Allows the app to read, create, update and delete files in the application's folder.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on behalf of the signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on your behalf. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the application to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete tasks a user has permissions to, including their own and shared tasks.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete tasks you have permissions to access, including your own and shared tasks.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write to your and shared tasks

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read tasks a user has permissions to access, including their own and shared tasks.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user and shared tasks
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read tasks you have permissions to access, including your own and shared tasks.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete contacts a user has permissions to, including their own and shared contacts.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared contacts
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete contacts you have permissions to access, including your own and shared contacts.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts a user has permissions to access, including their own and shared contacts.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user and shared contacts
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts you have permissions to access, including your own and shared contacts.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete events in all calendars in the organization user has permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared calendars
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in all calendars in your organization you have permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that the user can access, including delegate and shared calendars.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user and shared calendars
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that you can access, including delegate and shared calendars.?

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as the signed-in user, including sending on-behalf of others.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Send mail on behalf of others
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as you or on-behalf of someone else.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Send mail on behalf of others or yourself

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail a user has permission to access, including their own and shared mail. Does not include permission to send mail.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared mail
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete mail you have permission to access, including your own and shared mail. Does not allow the app to send mail on your behalf.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write mail?you can access

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read mail a user can access, including their own and shared mail.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user and shared mail
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read mail you can access, including shared mail.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign in and read user profile
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your organizational account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to user profile
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your profile, and discover your group membership, reports and manager. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' basic profiles
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on your behalf. Includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' full profiles
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all groups
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on your behalf.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups you can access.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Additionally allows group owners to manage their groups and allows group members to update group content.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write all groups
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read directory data
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups.  It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write directory data
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as other users, groups.  It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in the directory as the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Access directory as the signed in user
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to information in your work or school directory as you do.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read email in user mailboxes.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user mail
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read email in your mailbox.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to user mail
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as users in the organization.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Send mail as a user
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as you.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in user calendars .
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user calendars
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read events in your calendars.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user calendars
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in your calendars.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full access to your calendars

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user contacts.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user contacts
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts in your contact folders.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user contacts.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user contacts
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete contacts in your contact folders.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full access of your contacts

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's files.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user files
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your files.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the signed-in user's files.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to user files
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete your files.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full access to your files

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all files that user can access
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all files you can access.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all files that you have access to

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files the signed-in user can access.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full access to all files user can access
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files that you can access.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full access to all files you have access to

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to read documents and list  items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the application to read documents and list items in all site collections on your behalf
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows users to sign in to the app with their work or school accounts and allows the app to see basic user profile information.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Sign users in
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your work or school account and allows the app to read your basic profile information.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and update user data, even when they are not currently using the app.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Access user's data anytime
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to see and update your data, even when you are not currently using the app.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user tasks
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read user tasks
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your tasks

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your users' primary email address
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: View users' email address
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your primary email address

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to see your users' basic profile (name, picture, user name)
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: View users' basic profile
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to see your basic profile (name, picture, user name)

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read identity risk event information
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read hidden memberships
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups or administrative units on your behalf, for those hidden groups or adminstrative units that you have access to.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete tasks and plans (and tasks in them), that are assigned to or shared with the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Create, read, update and delete user tasks and projects
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete tasks assigned to you and plans (and tasks in them) shared with or owned by you.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Create, read, update and delete your tasks and projects

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read users' relevant people lists
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that's most relevant to you. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the application to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on your behalf.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all your site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to have full control of all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the application to have full control of all site collections on your behalf.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full control of all your site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's identity (authentication) providers? properties on behalf of the user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write identity providers
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's identity (authentication) providers? properties on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's identity (authentication) providers? properties on behalf of the user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read identity providers
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's identity (authentication) providers? properties on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read bookings information
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows an app to read bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows read businesses information, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write booking appointments
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows read businesses information, services, and staff on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read and write bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow create, delete and publish of booking businesses.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write bookings information
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows an app to read and write Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf. Does not allow create, delete and publish of booking businesses.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows an app to read, write and manage bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Manage bookings information
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows an app to read, write and manage bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via Exchange ActiveSync.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Access mailboxes via Exchange ActiveSync
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app full access to your mailboxes on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and write financials data on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write financials data
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write financials data on your behalf.

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read the identity risky user information for your organization without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all identity risky user information

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and create online meetings as an application in your organization.
Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

Allows the app to read any user's scored list of relevant people, without a signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1-to-1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Flag chat messages for violating policy

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all 1-to-1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams.
Allows the app to read all channel messages in Microsoft Teams
Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Flag channel messages for violating policy

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants.

Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user. ?It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Manage apps that this app creates or owns

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read online meeting details in your organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Access media streams in a call as an app (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. ?The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your organization.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Join group calls and meetings as a guest (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. ?The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your organization.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Join group calls and meetings as an app (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to place outbound calls to multiple users and add participants to meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Initiate outgoing group calls from the app (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization's directory, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Initiate outgoing 1:1 calls from the app (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read your organization's security events without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read your organization's security events without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security events

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.
Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.
Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades for all users.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write class assignments with grades

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades for all users.
Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades for all users.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write class assignments without grades

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read assignments without grades for all users.
Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read and written.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write the organization's roster

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read.

Allows the app to read a limited subset of properties from both the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users. Includes name, status, role, email address and photo.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read a limited subset of the organization's roster

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all user mailbox settings

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all OneNote notebooks

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read and write all domain properties without a signed in user. ?Also allows the app to add, ?verify and remove domains.
Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write mail in all mailboxes

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write contacts in all mailboxes

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read group properties and memberships, and read the calendar and conversations for all groups, without a signed-in user.

Allows the app to create groups, read all group properties and memberships, update group properties and memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write group calendar and conversations.  All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user.  Does not allow user or group deletion.
Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user.  Does not allow device creation, device deletion or update of device alternative security identifiers.
Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.
Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the identity risk event information for your organization without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all identity risk event information

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write files in all site collections

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all files in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read files in all site collections

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.
